articles.title: Realme C63 unveiled with a 50MP camera, 5,000 mAh battery, and 45W charging - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: It packs a 90Hz display. The Realme C63, slated to launch on June 5 in Malaysia, has been unveiled in Indonesia. It is powered by the Unisoc T612 SoC, runs...
articles.content: The Realme C63, slated to launch on June 5 in Malaysia, has been unveiled in Indonesia. It is powered by the Unisoc T612 SoC, runs Android 14, and comes with up to 8GB RAM and 256GB storage onboard.… [+1399 chars]
